item.title: N-Dimensional Tourists: Conflict Resolution
item.description: About these rules These rules are part of the N-Dimensional Tourists ruleset. Specifically, this entry describes a mechanism to resolve Conflicts between two parties or more during a role-playing game. This mechanism is designed to be abstract and generic – it works just as well with a pirate crew boarding a merchan ship as with two Formula 1 pilots racing each other or three political parties attempting to win or steal the elections.
